User instruction: 创建新文档并添加标题"员工手册"，添加水印"内部文件"。
Feasible API sequence: create_and_save_docx(doc_path, "");add_heading(doc_path, "员工手册", level=1);add_watermark(doc_path, "内部文件");

User instruction: 添加目录，并设置为三级目录。
添加二级标题"公司制度"、"员工福利"和"办公指南"。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "公司制度", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "员工福利", level=2);add_heading(doc_path, "办公指南", level=2);

User instruction: 在每个二级标题下添加三级标题。
Feasible API sequence: add_heading(doc_path, "考勤制度", level=3);add_heading(doc_path, "请假制度", level=3);add_heading(doc_path, "社会保险", level=3);add_heading(doc_path, "带薪休假", level=3);add_heading(doc_path, "办公环境", level=3);add_heading(doc_path, "IT支持", level=3);
